item.title: National Volunteers Week 2019
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
National Volunteers Week is from the 1- 7 June.  This is a UK wide campaign now in its 35th year.  Recognise, celebrate and thank volunteers  by using the hashtag #VolunteersWeek and tag @Sw_EngVolunteer when tweeting about our amazing volunteers around the region.

The post National Volunteers Week 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
National Volunteers Week is from the 1- 7 June.  This is a UK wide campaign now in its 35th year.  Recognise, celebrate and thank volunteers  by using the hashtag #VolunteersWeek and tag @Sw_EngVolunteer when tweeting about our amazing volunteers around the region.

The post National Volunteers Week 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Swim England North East Region Special General Meeting – Resolution
item.dc:creator: Linda Tjaguns
item.description:
At the Special General Meeting held on Sunday 26th May at John Charles Centre for Sport, Leeds the below resolution was carried unanimously. Special General Meeting Resolution The next steps are that the Board will be drawing up the formal procedure to move to incorporation later this year. We thank those members who attended the […]

The post Swim England North East Region Special General Meeting – Resolution appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
At the Special General Meeting held on Sunday 26th May at John Charles Centre for Sport, Leeds the below resolution was carried unanimously.

Special General Meeting Resolution

The next steps are that the Board will be drawing up the formal procedure to move to incorporation later this year.

We thank those members who attended the meeting.

The post Swim England North East Region Special General Meeting – Resolution appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Swim England Water Polo National Age Group Championships 2019
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
Congratulations to the Swim England North East Region Teams who participated and performed so well at the Swim England Water Polo National Age Group Championships 2019 held at Ponds Forge, Sheffield on 27th May. U17 Girls City of Sheffield – Gold U19 Girls Rotherham Metro – Silver U19 Boys City of Sheffield – Bronze Thanks […]

The post Swim England Water Polo National Age Group Championships 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations to the Swim England North East Region Teams who participated and performed so well at the Swim England Water Polo National Age Group Championships 2019 held at Ponds Forge, Sheffield on 27th May.

U17 Girls City of Sheffield – Gold

U19 Girls Rotherham Metro – Silver

U19 Boys City of Sheffield – Bronze

Thanks goes to all those involved in delivering a successful event.

Further information is available at: https://www.swimming.org/waterpolo/water-polo-news/

 

The post Swim England Water Polo National Age Group Championships 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Dry Land Strength & Conditioning Swimming Coach Workshop
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
This workshop covers the fundamentals of body weight Strength and Conditioning including correct technique, basic movements and how to apply this in a training programme. It is aimed at Level 1 and Level 2 coaches working with age group/youth swimmers. This is a CPD opportunity not a qualification. All candidates will be provided with access […]

The post Dry Land Strength & Conditioning Swimming Coach Workshop appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
This workshop covers the fundamentals of body weight Strength and Conditioning including correct technique, basic movements and how to apply this in a training programme. It is aimed at Level 1 and Level 2 coaches working with age group/youth swimmers. This is a CPD opportunity not a qualification.

All candidates will be provided with access to the appropriate course resources.

The workshops will be delivered by Swim England Sports Science Specialist Tim Jarrett.

Date:   Saturday 6th July 2019

Venue:   Energise Leisure Centre, York YO24 3DX

Time:   1:00pm to 5:00pm

Cost:   £20 per candidate

Places can be booked at: http://asaner.org.uk/event/dry-land-strength-conditioning-workshop/

Post expires at 8:17am on Monday July 8th, 2019

The post Dry Land Strength & Conditioning Swimming Coach Workshop appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: North East Divers Compete at FINA Diving World Series
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
Several Swim England North East athletes represented the Great Britain Diving Team at the FINA Diving World Series event at the London Aquatics Centre over the weekend of 17th to 19th May 2019. Jack Laugher from City of Leeds helped the team secure their first ever one-two podium finish at the event. Further details are […]

The post North East Divers Compete at FINA Diving World Series appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Several Swim England North East athletes represented the Great Britain Diving Team at the FINA Diving World Series event at the London Aquatics Centre over the weekend of 17th to 19th May 2019.

Jack Laugher from City of Leeds helped the team secure their first ever one-two podium finish at the event.

Further details are available at https://www.swimming.org/diving/laugher-goodfellow-gold-silver/#

The post North East Divers Compete at FINA Diving World Series appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Swim England NW/NE Open Water Festival 2019
item.dc:creator: Linda Tjaguns
item.description:
Swim England North West/North East are pleased to announce that this year’s annual Open Water Championships are being held on 29th June 2019 at Salford Quays. This competition will include: 1500 Challenge North West and North East Open Water Championships North West and North East Masters Open Water Championships All championship events incorporate the following […]

The post Swim England NW/NE Open Water Festival 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Swim England North West/North East are pleased to announce that this year’s annual Open Water Championships are being held on 29th June 2019 at Salford Quays.

This competition will include:

  • 1500 Challenge
  • North West and North East Open Water Championships
  • North West and North East Masters Open Water Championships

All championship events incorporate the following County Championships; Cheshire, Lancashire, Yorkshire, Northumberland & Durham.

For the first year, competitors must have their numbers displayed on their swim cap (provided), back and upper arms. Swimmer will also be required to wear Electronic Chip and/or Wristband provided.

Entries close midnight Wednesday 13th June 2019.

Open Water Swimming Festival 2019

Post expires at 12:42pm on Thursday June 13th, 2019

The post Swim England NW/NE Open Water Festival 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Head Coach & Assistant Coach Vacancy – Bedale Sharks ASC
item.dc:creator: Linda Tjaguns
item.description:
Bedale Sharks ASC are seeking a new Level 2 or Level 3 qualified Head Coach who can motivate, encourage and communicate well with young people.  You will lead a small coaching team and be required to plan and deliver coaching sessions in accordance with LTAD. They are also seeking someone who is Level 1 or […]

The post Head Coach & Assistant Coach Vacancy – Bedale Sharks ASC appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Bedale Sharks ASC are seeking a new Level 2 or Level 3 qualified Head Coach who can motivate, encourage and communicate well with young people.  You will lead a small coaching team and be required to plan and deliver coaching sessions in accordance with LTAD.

They are also seeking someone who is Level 1 or Level 2 qualified as an Assistant Coach to further strengthen the overall coaching team.

Closing date 7th June 2019.

Click here.

Post expires at 10:13am on Friday June 7th, 2019

The post Head Coach & Assistant Coach Vacancy – Bedale Sharks ASC appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Special General Meeting – Swim England North East Region
item.dc:creator: Linda Tjaguns
item.description:
A Special General Meeting of the Swim England North East Region will be held on Sunday 26th May 2019 at 1.30 p.m. in the Parkside Suite, John Charles Centre for Sport, Leeds. The purpose of the meeting is to consider the Incorporation of the Swim England North East Region. It is important that a quorum […]

The post Special General Meeting – Swim England North East Region appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
A Special General Meeting of the Swim England North East Region will be held on Sunday 26th May 2019 at 1.30 p.m. in the Parkside Suite, John Charles Centre for Sport, Leeds.

The purpose of the meeting is to consider the Incorporation of the Swim England North East Region.

It is important that a quorum is achieved for this meeting in order for the resolution to be validated.   Therefore could all clubs please complete the Delegate Registration form and send to the Regional Office, 13 Horsemarket, Darlington, DL1 5PW, before Thursday 16th May, 2019.

Please find below documents for your attention:

  • A Delegate Registration Form
  • A copy of the Resolution (for information)
  • A copy of the Draft Articles (for information)

The SGM pack has been sent in an electronic form to Members whose e-mail address is registered with the North East Region.

If you require further clarification on any of these matters please do not hesitate to contact the Regional Office.

We look forward to seeing you at this meeting on Sunday 26th May 2019.

The post Special General Meeting – Swim England North East Region appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Rankings

item.description:
